meanings.definition: A secret or hidden knowledge or mystery.
meanings.sent1: The ancient scroll contained an arcanum that unlocked great power.
meanings.sent2: The arcanum of the old wizard's magic was known only to a select few.
meanings.sent3: The arcanum of the missing cookie jar was finally revealed to be the family dog.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes held an arcanum of sadness that no one could decipher.
meanings.sent5: The arcanum of the haunted house whispered through the halls, enticing brave explorers.

meanings.definition: A secret or mysterious remedy, potion, or charm.
meanings.sent1: The witch brewed an arcanum to cure the village's ailments.
meanings.sent2: Legends spoke of a powerful arcanum that could heal any wound.
meanings.sent3: The arcanum potion turned the prince into a frog instead of granting him riches.
meanings.sent4: She carried an arcanum charm that protected her from evil spirits.
meanings.sent5: The ancient book revealed the arcanum elixir that granted eternal youth.
